Character Name Database.beatPlugin.description: Character names from multiple cultures and languages

Cherry-Pick Scenes.beatPlugin.description: Create a new document with selected scenes

Clean Extra Spaces.beatPlugin.description: Clean any extra spaces at the end of all lines

Every Line by a Character.beatPlugin.description: Creates a new document with every line of dialogue said by the selected character

FTOutliner.beatPlugin.description: A Flexible Time Outliner for navigating, structuring and editing your screenplay.

Gather Scenes by Character.beatPlugin.description: Creates a new document with scenes involving the selected character

Gather Scenes by Heading.beatPlugin.description: Creates a new document with scenes containing a given text in heading

Gather Scenes by Storyline.beatPlugin.description: Creates a new document with scenes containing the given storyline

List Locations.beatPlugin.description: Quick and dirty list of shooting locations

Map Character Appearances.beatPlugin.description: A visual timeline of character appearances

Shuffle Scenes.beatPlugin.description: Randomize the order of your scenes and create a new, twisted version of your story.
